Name: Sphere 3: Rage of the Devastator
About the game: «Sphere 3: Rage of the Devastator» offers you countless opportunities for PvP combat and a classic fantasy storyline. The plot is revealed through over 1000 quests telling the story of a factional confrontation ripe with strife. political intrigue and betrayal. Players may engage in large-scale PvP battles from the very beginning of the game by joining legendary castle sieges for characters of different levels, duel arenas, blood-soaked battlefields and countless confrontations sparking all over the world. On the other hand, non-hardcore players are welcome to choose a peaceful existence on a PvE-server where nobody can attack them without permission. Sphere 3's defining feature is its non-targeting combat system: the target of an attack is determined by aiming. Such control scheme is flexible enough to offer plenty of options to an experienced combatant and a new player alike. Key features: World-encompassing PvP zone: the battles between players, clans, alliances and factions can take place in most gameplay areas. Watch your back — danger may lurk behind every corner. Hardcore non-targeting combat system: «Sphere 3» combat gives players unprecedented freedom, features dynamic damage calculation mechanic and allows you to switch between different types of attacks thanks to a special color-coded target indicator. Performance won't be a problem: modest system requirements and make «Sphere 3» an ideal place for PvP massacres on a massive scale. Equal opportunities: the items from in-game store can be obtained by completing in-game quests, acquiring special coins and exchanging them for premium goods at a special vendor. One of the game's defining features is castle sieges —legendary, challenging, truly exciting: to capture a castle, the attacker needs to acquire siege engines and complete a number of prerequisites. Espionage and cross-clan intrigues make sieges even more fascinating! Brutal yet fair PK (Player Kill) and player karma systems: PK is not penalized in free PvP zones but a character with negative karma risks losing both gold and personal items. 9 unique classes! Choose a combat tactic and stick to it — throw yourself into the fray, protect your allies, neutralize key enemy targets by using stealth or burn enemies to crisp with magic fire— you decide! Each class has unique advantages, and it is up to you to take advantage of them 100%. Those who are not yet ready for the hardcore gameplay may enjoy playing on a separate PvE server where players cannot be attacked outside of designated combat areas. Various PvE activities: a crafting system, dangerous dungeons, world bosses that require advanced tactics to defeat, global cooperative missions taking players behind the enemy lines and much more. Engaging crafting system: the best crafters in the game will never lack for customers, but becoming one is not going to be easy! The long-awaited sequel that took the best features from the original Sphere — a good way to satisfy your nostalgia while enjoying constant updates and modern graphics!
